label: FinancialCard
comment: A card used to represent a financial account for a trade settlement.

datatypeProperties.comment: The indication of whether or not this cash used for payment. is applicable.
A cardholder's name, expressed as text, for this digital method used for payment.
The date of expiry up to which this trade settlement financial card is valid.
The interest rate expressed as a percentage for this trade settlement financial card.
A name, expressed as text, of the company issuing this experience item voucher.
The indication of whether or not this trade settlement financial card has a microchip.
The date from which this trade settlement financial card is valid.
The unique card verification number for security purposes to help verify the card user is in actual possession of this trade settlement financial card.

referencedBy.comment: A financial card applicable to this trade settlement payment means.
A financial card identified for this trade settlement payment means.
A financial card specified in this header trade settlement.
